https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p6owlIaOogPw6msJyWq80hv7Vpw.jpg An Ukranian woman enters Belgium illegally and hides in the van of a driver abandoned by his wife. He ends up helping her to find her husband who had emigrated long before. They are joined by his wacky Spanish mother and cute young daughter. 25 Degrees in Winter
